title: THURSDAY 3/18 - Wide Receivers on the move
itunes:title: THURSDAY 3/18 - Wide Receivers on the move
description:
The Cardinals with a busy day as they sign wide receiver AJ Green (0:08), trade for Rodney Hudson (0:26), but lose two defensive stars as Patrick Peterson (0:39) and Haason Reddick (0:56) have moved on. Linebacker Kyle Van Noy (1:20) makes a return to New England. Former Lions WR Kenny Golladay (1:37) takes a bite out of the Big Apple, while Curtis Samuel heads to the Nation's Capital (1:55)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
